website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully styled toaster with many of the same features as the more expensive models.
pros: Chrome finish makes it durable for daily use
Precise toasting and a shade selector make sure you get your toast how you want it
Extra-wide slots, auto-off, bagel button, defrost button, and slide-out crumb tray make it convenient
cons: Tends to show fingerprints and streaks, but it easily cleans

customer_reviews.title: YOU ONLY HAD ONE JOB, ONE JOB!
customer_reviews.text: Received my new toaster today, 1st picture is the toaster I received and 2nd photo is the stock photo on Amazon! Can you spot the difference? If not watch the video.😡
customer_reviews.author: Miss Benware

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good; Hard to Clean
customer_reviews.text: After having lived with this toaster for a few months, I can say it toasts bread pretty well, though unevenly. However, most crumbs do not end up on the crumb tray--they get caught inside the toaster, and smoke and burn on subsequent toastings. I have yet to be able to dislodge them all and so cannot really clean the toaster out. That is a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: K. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: Never toasted evenly, since day 1 it would toast one side dark and the other side light. One handle snapped off and then just a few uses later the other handle snapped off. It's a cheap toaster and you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: Let's say the toaster works. The slots are wide enough for a bagel. However, they are not long enough for some of the cuts of retail breads (an example is Rye Bread). It is hard to adjust the "wellness" of the toast. Burnt or medium undone. Crumb catcher lets as many crumbs on counter as in catcher when you remove for cleaning. When pushing bread down for toasting the catch does not always engage. The plus, when toast is done, the up assist does work.
customer_reviews.author: Gettnwizer

customer_reviews.title: Poor handle design (Plastic).
customer_reviews.text: This toaster has a plastic handle attached to a plastic lever that is very delicate and will break off with the slightest pressure on the outer edge, you must push down on handle at the rear where it attaches to the lever and this is no guarantee it wont break. My first one broke the 4th time I used it and the replacement is doing fine so far. I like the toasters features and the way it toasts but they need to change the handle lever back to metal and it would be a great toaster. I do not recommend purchasing this Toaster until they change the design..
customer_reviews.author: Strong Wolf

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since this was similar to Consumer Reports recommended buy I decided to purchase. 1. Toast quality is terrible. One side perfect other side burned. 2. Buttons labeled incorrectly. I only discovered this thanks to another reviewer here who posted video. I thought it was just broken, but the button labeled defrost is actually cancel, so the cancel button is defrost. Unacceptable regardless. This toaster is going back! Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Jennster

customer_reviews.title: OK while it lasts...
customer_reviews.text: This was a functional toaster for the 18 months we had it before it completely quit working. Slowly but surely, it reliably produced evenly toasted bread. After about one year, it started taking longer and longer to toast. I noticed some if the heating filaments appeared to stop working, and exactly 18 months after we purchased it, it died completely. We are not buying a Hamilton Beach replacement due to the unreasonably poor build quality.
customer_reviews.author: P. K. Simon

customer_reviews.title: Shinier than I anticipated.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is perfect, especially for the price. It toasts evenly and with the defrost setting and bagel setting it is everything I need in a toaster. It is shinier than I thought but after a couple of days, I didn't notice as much. I have been happy with Hamilton Beach products lately.
customer_reviews.author: JOANN L. GIRARD

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and performs great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great selection. It is wonderfully made and performs great. The style is contemporary yet traditional. The controls are easy to use and read without having to look for reading glasses.Toast and bagels both come out well toasted as expected and I would recommend this toaster to everyone looking for a stylish functional toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Zagaya

customer_reviews.title: Problem with temp getting and burns
customer_reviews.text: I was very leary ordering this toaster... the reviews were so mixed, but I did order it and worked great at first.. now that I have gone past the return time I'm seeing the issues that others were having from start- after using for 2 months the left 2 sides are not working.. even when put on low setting its burning on even lowest setting. We no longer can use the left side of this as afraid could catch on fire .. very sad that this is a ongoing issue that is known about and company continues to sell defective product.. when recieved and tried it I thought maybe the issue was resolved but apparently not!!
customer_reviews.author: LisaBucher1

customer_reviews.title: Slots not very wide
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it advertised wide slots, and I wanted a toaster to accommodate bagels. Unfortunately, the slots are a little wider than my previous toaster, but a sliced bagel really doesn't fit well. I find that sometimes I must slice a little off the top to get it to fit! The bagel ends up crushed against the retaining grid, and after toasting, adheres to the grid. I the have to pry the bagel free. Also, the spring to pop up the toast is VERY weak, I have to manually lift anything but thinly sliced bread. Temperature control is difficult to read. I should have spent a little more money on a better toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Dave TD

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS TOASTER...
customer_reviews.text: Originally replaced by manufacturer under warranty when defective. Shipping and handling was paid by Hamilton Beach. Now defective again after using Amazon purchased replacement unit for about two months. Each time electronic controls malfunctioned. We have had three of this model toaster now. Each went bad. Told by manufacturer that this model was no longer available to ship and that we would have to choose another model for warranty replacement.. Had to pay shipping and handling costs of $11.67 for another replacement model. No more Hamilton beach toasters for us.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: This toaster is terrible!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about 6 months ago and just recently, it has started working sporadically. The handle won't stay down, as if there is no power to the unit. Move to a new plug and it sometimes works. Go back to the original plug and again, it sometimes works. Not reliable at all. Supplement to my original review: The toaster has completely stopped working less than 8 months after I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Makes toast so it does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as I’d hoped. This one is noisier then the one it replaced. For some reason there is like a rattling noise when depressing bread lever. So far that’s our only complaint. Does have a defrost button that does defrost frozen bread but still toasts a little. Not as sound as our old toaster but will keep it because it still makes toast and that’s why we purchased it. It is a wee bit smaller then our old toaster and still toast bagels so that’s a plus, but I do wish it was more boxy of a look.
customer_reviews.author: Justme66

customer_reviews.title: Toaster was “toast,” half DOA
customer_reviews.text: The toaster was half-dead-on-arrival when I received it. This is a four slice toaster and it looked really good. Unfortunately, the lever that lowers the bread in the right two slots did not work properly. It would not latch when lowered to keep the mechanism down and switch on the heating elements, so that side of the toaster was useless and, shall we say, “toast”! Lever for the other two slots on the left side worked okay. Returning to seller for refund.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. King, esq.

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach not like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I am disappointed by this toaster. There is no way to 'pop toast up', if it needs additional toasting. However, I've burned almost everything I put in on the 'lightest' setting, which I assume is all the way to the left. It has no markings to indicate light or dark. I bought it specifically for bagels, but it even burnt that at the lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mildred M.

customer_reviews.title: One pair burns toast and the other it’s stock on ‘bagel’ function
customer_reviews.text: Got the 4 slice toaster. One of the pairs do not work, seems to be stock in “bagel” function. The other side only works the first time, if you use it a second time then it burns the toast (seems to stay too hot after the first one). With these two issues it defiets the purpose of getting a 4 slice toaster since I can only toast 2 at a time and on top of that I have to wait for it to cool down before I put another pair. I received it before going on vacations so I didn’t notice the defect until I came back otherwise I would’ve return it. So frustrating!!! Waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: MRoberts

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I like this toaster for the price. It looks very sleek and modern. The buttons/knob/lever all feel like they are sturdy/good quality. It is wonderful for frozen waffles and pastry b/c of the defrost option. The bagel setting is fantastic! It toasts the cut side and warms the outside. I am satisfied with this purchase and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Lu

customer_reviews.title: Love the toaster, but not the shipping cost
customer_reviews.text: Love the toaster , works great and looks great in my kitchen! The only problem we had, was when we ordered we didn’t notice the shipping charge was, it was outrageous! I won’t make that mistake again. This toaster is worth the money, but be aware of the shipping they charge!
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Toasts on one side
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited about this toaster, but 6 months down the line it only toasts on one side. This is frustrating, particularly on week days when the family is rushing out the door for school and work. I'll try reach out to the manufacturer and report back if there is any luck. I'd say spring for a different brand and pay a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: labebeG

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This toaster was to replace one that toasted more on one side of the bread than the other. It cost way more than the first toaster and still had the same issue of not toasting even close to equally on both sides. Go to Walmart, don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Chinakin

customer_reviews.title: It will work for little bit
customer_reviews.text: I have this toaster for little over a month and it broke. The heating element does not heat well and the bread will not come out of the toaster. I have to unplug the toaster and pry the bread out of it. Not worth the $ spent.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: This One Was A BUST
customer_reviews.text: This one was a bust. Not as good as it's predecessor (which was awesome). No way to make it toast both sides of the bread evenly. On one dot it toasts only one side to the desired outcome. Moving it to the next dot burns both sides. Basically junk. First bad product I bought from Amazon. Going to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to push down lever
customer_reviews.text: So great to be able to toast 4 items at once- compared to our old 2 slot toaster. Everything is great in this for the most part. I do feel that the levers are hard to push down, they need a pretty steadyhand. My 6 year old likes to make her own toast and struggles to get it going
customer_reviews.author: Evan Dannenberger

customer_reviews.title: Functional, Sleek, On a Budget.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is a great add on to my counter top! I've been looking for an affordable toaster that had a sleek look, but in my budget as well. This toaster won! It has multiple setting making toasting bread, bagel, or even my waffles easy and to my liking. The display is a plus as well it isn't a guessing game! This toaster is easy to clean as well. If you looking for a toaster that not only looks great but does it's job on a budget. This is the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: StellarElle

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the cancel button! My kids always break our toaster by pushing up the handle when their toast takes too long. This toaster had a resolution. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Bears

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: My toaster stopped working. When I notified Hamilton Beach they insisted I send my receipt before they would even listen to me. Well, Amazon had a copy of the order BUT no receipt or bill of sale. Now Hamilton Beach will not help me in any way.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieA

customer_reviews.title: This is a bad toaster
customer_reviews.text: I have to stand there and hold the lever down to toast the bread...doesn’t matter what combination of settings I use. Ain’t nobody got time for that!
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: That's not a bagel
customer_reviews.text: The good: it has four slots, gets hot, and blends with the rest of my appliances. The bad: it thinks everything is a bagel. Despite what combination of buttons are pressed, it won't toast things evenly. The sides marked for the inside of the bagel always toast significantly more than the outsides. Pretty disappointing...
customer_reviews.author: Matt Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Great for Price
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports rated this toaster best in its price range which was recommended enough for me. It consistently toasts bread and bagels to proper color which is all I was looking for. However, the one improvement necessary to make this a 5 star toaster would be the units ability to push up the toasted bread high enough out of the slots to grab without the possibility of burning your fingers
customer_reviews.author: cindyv2395

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very stylish toaster, and toasts our bread and bagels nicely and evenly. We moved from a DeLonghi toaster oven to this guy, and we are happy with the smaller amount of counter space this guy takes up, and it definitely does a better job of toasting overall. Due to the chrome finish it is a little bit high maintenance, which I didn't expect (it collects dust and fingerprints), but if you give it a wipe down with your regular kitchen cleaning it will stay looking nice and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Jean Paulson

customer_reviews.title: 2 year life
customer_reviews.text: One annoying thing about this toaster is that it is always in the same length of time. You have to change it every time you use it if you want it toasted less or more. This was a sufficient toaster while it lasted. It is broken after just over 2 years. It is now stuck on bagel mode which is rather annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan L Marshfield

customer_reviews.title: Does the job of toasting bread very well.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. A reasonable price for a toaster with digital control of the timer. Does it's number one job and that is toast bread.
customer_reviews.author: Reba A

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly on the super fast Amazon shipping. Replaced our dead toaster and it is functional and has a nice, clean modern look.
customer_reviews.author: soapydoc

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: this toaster was horrible. One day it would toast the bread on both sides and the next day only one side. Unfortunately, I kept thinking it would be okay and the 30 day lapsed for returning. Amazon was ABSOLUTELY no help and three different representatives told me to call the manufacturer. NEVER buy this toaster I only gave it one star because it would not let me post without highlighting a star
customer_reviews.author: History!

customer_reviews.title: Also buyer beware a regular slice of bread like Oro-wheat (white-bread now) Oat-nut bread slices are taller than ...
customer_reviews.text: I rate it a 2.5. It's not even 2 months old and the left side of toasters, the right hand slot browns more than the left hand slot it used to be evenly toasted when we first got it. Also buyer beware a regular slice of bread like Oro-wheat (white-bread now) Oat-nut bread slices are taller than the toaster is deep, sad. 1/4 of your toast is only warmed. We'll see how long the right hand side pair lasts. I'll be donating this toaster as well.
customer_reviews.author: Will The Thrill

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable, inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because it was highly rated by Consumer Reports but it only toasts the inside of the bread as if it were set on the Bagel setting. I like my toast quite brown and it won't toast even the one side brown on the darkest setting. I have to pull the bread out after the first cycle, change sides and toast another whole cycle on the darkest setting to get both sides toasted and have it dark enough for my tastes. VERY disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Sue Whitford

customer_reviews.title: Toast
customer_reviews.text: This toaster is working out pretty well. We haven't had it for long and it takes a while to know where to set the darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It may have been just that unit that was defective.. the toast never popped out.. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE DEE

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke after four years
customer_reviews.text: The main toaster handle snapped off after four years of use. Turns out it's all plastic. Disappointed. I want a toaster to last more than four years. Will be contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Train

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a toaster that I broke of the same brand (it was very used). This one is also slightly slimmer than my old one and I like how it kinda has a retro look/ shape but still modern.
customer_reviews.author: Jody H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t toast evenly
customer_reviews.text: all of the coils don’t heat up so the bread toasts uneven and takes forever to toast
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Shiny chrome looks nice,  but toast edges still burn
customer_reviews.text: I got a new toaster because I was tired of having burned edges on all the toast if it is the right crispness in the middle. Same problem with this one. Still have to do it 2 times at lower temp and even still a bit if black on edge to scrape off.
customer_reviews.author: trip?

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone else soo tired of burnt toast? Of half burnt half not cooked toast? I find that a decent toaster is harder to find than one might think, but finally we hit the jackpot! This toasts evenly, and I love that I can do one batch of 4 all at the same time to feed the whole family. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Whitt

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent levels of toasting from one use to another. ...
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent levels of toasting from one use to another. One side completely stopped working after about two years. The plunger/handle you press down fell off after three years for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: RCO

customer_reviews.title: Great toaster!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster and looks much more expensive than it is. We've used it for bagels, toast and pop tarts and it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster. The only negative thing to say is sometimes it toasts a little too dark. Even if I haven't turned the knob to a darker toasting setting.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey G.

customer_reviews.title: Good cost
customer_reviews.text: Love that it has a clean drawer on the back that you can pull out and take the crumbs out of. So perfect and easy to use. Got it on prime day
customer_reviews.author: Mel M

customer_reviews.title: Short life
customer_reviews.text: This toaster stopped working 13 months after having it. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that this stopped working in less than 3 years. I cannot get it to even put color on the bread and forget it being crispy. Typical use was maybe 2-3 times per week.
customer_reviews.author: jcook

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE, so pretty
customer_reviews.text: BEST VALUE. It's so pretty and great size. We use it every morning and love it so much. It's so good for what we paid, there's no need to spend more for something to toast your bread. So glad we bought this one with 4 slots for me and my boyfriend instead of the 2 slot one.
customer_reviews.author: Julissa Almonte

customer_reviews.title: It does what it said it does!
customer_reviews.text: The toaster is practically brand new and does a wonderful job of what it’s supposed to do, which is toast. Thanks again for great customer service. Keep up the great work!
customer_reviews.author: RonLiv

customer_reviews.title: Will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toaster, I was hesitant but it has been fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Tkelly

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Was missing a rubber thing on bottom of leg but doesn't affect toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Syverson

customer_reviews.title: Have long been looking for a toaster that would actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Have long been looking for a toaster that would actually make EVEN toast. Followed the recommendation in Consumer Reports and bought this one. The Hamilton Beach Modern Chrome produces exactly that, and is one of the least expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Baker

customer_reviews.title: Has separate toast hole controls.
customer_reviews.text: Nice toaster with easy clean trays in the bottom for quick clean up. Also has separate controls for both sets of toast holes.
customer_reviews.author: Brian T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Browns evenly for everything that we've tried, and what exactly were you going to ask a toaster to do?
customer_reviews.author: James V. Yardley

customer_reviews.title: Does not function as expected.
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks nice but does not function correctly. It runs way to hot and defaults to 4 so you always have to turn it down. When you use it once and go to use it right after that regardless of how low you set it the toast burns. The cancel button does not respond and you have to unplug it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for Well Done Bagels
customer_reviews.text: Works fine for toast, (I like it well done), but even the highest level leaves my bagels only slightly toasted. If I get this from a restaurant, I would send it back. So since I don't usually need to toast more than one bagel, I have one setting for maximum and the other for finishing the bagel. Slower than it should be, but at least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Ron C Leslie

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper...
customer_reviews.text: The toaster arrived before the date indicated and although the outer box was damaged in transit, the inner box housing the toaster remained intact and the toaster was not at all damaged. This toaster complements my kitchen and it toasts very well. Yes, it's a keeper and I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Who Da Guy

customer_reviews.title: Within a week we noticed that the right chamber would ...
customer_reviews.text: Within a week we noticed that the right chamber would not "grasp" and lock, therefore the heaters wouldn't come on. Returned for replacement. We considered it a random failure. When the replacement arrived, within a week the right side handle broke off. We returned that one also and went to the local store to buy another brand/model.
customer_reviews.author: Jim F.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons are mislabeled
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking little toaster that works fast.... once you figure out what the buttons are supposed to be labeled. Someone screwed up on that part. I wish sellers would be more honest about why the price was reduced. I would be really embarrassed if I had bought this as a gift for someone....
customer_reviews.author: m1ssy3k

customer_reviews.title: Broke quick
customer_reviews.text: One side of the toaster became "stuck" in bagel mode about a month after I began using it. So only one side of each slice will toast.
customer_reviews.author: PrincessPang

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as Advertised, easy to clean. Simple to use. Looks good on a kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: HeidiInMinnesota

customer_reviews.title: The one thing I do not like is you can only pop the toast up using ...
customer_reviews.text: It's o.k. Does not toast very evenly, but what toaster does? The one thing I do not like is you can only pop the toast up using the button, you can not just use the lever. I thought one can do it both ways, maybe something wrong with the one I got?
customer_reviews.author: jack

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on prime day. Love it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: r.sedano

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase this toaster!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this toaster for exactly one year and it is no longer functioning properly. It burns toast on one side and the other side of the toast is not even cooked at all. You get what you pay for! My advice is to scroll along to another brand!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: The toaster itself seems to work fine; however
customer_reviews.text: The toaster itself seems to work fine; however, when I opened it, it had marks all over that looked like someone had tried to wipe it down before, a rust like residue all around the edges and appeared dirty on the outside (inside looked unused). I used a gleen cloth to clean it properly--maybe it just looked dingy because it is chrome, but I would think that the item would have been more presentable considering it was suppose to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Caci

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: Nice metal toaster. Works great once figure out your perfect setting
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 1/2 years and then stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for 1.5 years and then after I cleaned the crumb tray it stopped working. Lever won't stay down and unit will not turn on. Checked it thoroughly for obstructions and there were none.
customer_reviews.author: RHSPT

customer_reviews.title: not the best toaster I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: not the best toaster I've ever had. alittle disappointed in the way it operates. uneven browning. slots could be alittle wider.
customer_reviews.author: wendy young

customer_reviews.title: I'm picky when it come to appliances.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best toaster I have ever owned. I have other Hamilton Beach appliances. All perform beyond my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: richard w danap

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Was a house warming gift, she has only said good things about it. Hopefully it will last them along time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: ... toaster a few months ago and has been working great with no issues
customer_reviews.text: Bought this toaster a few months ago and has been working great with no issues! It has a nice, sleek look and doesn’t take up a whole lot of counter space. It is on the smaller side and cannot fit large pieces of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Mags

customer_reviews.title: Break Room Addition
customer_reviews.text: This thing is sleek and works well. Only downside is almost all sourdough bread brands do not fit horizontally.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bathurst

customer_reviews.title: Great quality toaster
customer_reviews.text: It looks better that what I expected, great quality materials and finishing.
customer_reviews.author: Efren

customer_reviews.title: Overall quality
customer_reviews.text: Within the first week of operation the handle to push bread down would not stay depressed. It took multiple attempts to keep the bread down, and it has continued to happen since then. Additionally that handle feels quite flimsy and not well made. I will be returning this toaster.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Daley

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach 24791 4-Slice Chome Toaster
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, was delivered sooner than expected, I read the manual and plugged it in and used it for over a week now.. it perfectly toasted Bagels, English Muffins, Texas Toast and regular toast.. I'm Happy with this Hamilton Beach 4-Slice Toaster.
customer_reviews.author: George Vandervort

customer_reviews.title: So far it toasts fine, but it's flimsy
customer_reviews.text: So far it toasts fine, but it's flimsy, really lightweight and to my dismay , after only two months the lettering is rubbing off! Good thing there's only three buttons so I can remember which is cancel, defrost and bagel. Not real good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Teatiiime

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working just after the 1 year warranty period
customer_reviews.text: We enjoyed this toaster initially, however we noticed that at times that 1 side of our bread would be toasted quite a bit more than the other. Two of the toast slots stopped working completely just after the 1 year warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: NDGA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It does a fine job, plus it toasts faster than any other toaster I have had.
customer_reviews.author: todd magnuson

customer_reviews.title: Toast & butter?
customer_reviews.text: I love this toaster. No more waiting around for two waffles to cook when I have 6 more to go (3 kids). Or flipping them after a few minutes because they cook uneven. This toaster does it all and cooks evenly so product doesn’t burn!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B

customer_reviews.title: Very poor. 2 weeks after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very poor. 2 weeks after purchase, not toasting evenly, mostly on one side so had to switch around. Called HB and they said not to return to Amazon but they would replace it but they never did. I would never buy another Hamilton Beach product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: antonia m. cyrus

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy, Cheaply made, Wont' last
customer_reviews.text: This toaster did not last very long. The handle on the right side that you push down to make toast has broken off. On all the slots it only toasts the right side of the bread. Our last toaster we had before this one lasted for 10 years. This one has not lasted 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy in GA

customer_reviews.title: Bad, bad bad
customer_reviews.text: This toaster looks really nice, but is terrible on toasting evenly. If I hadn't of waited so long, I would've sent it back. It did not meet my expectations at all.
customer_reviews.author: numbersixteen

customer_reviews.title: Fine adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Once we figured out our preferred toast darkness level it makes a consistent product. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: Dogbreath2

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  High quality!  Toasts everything perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly toasts everything! Bagles, toast, Pop tarts! Looks great. High quality! Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: David King

customer_reviews.title: I like thus product very much specially the bagel option
customer_reviews.text: I like thus product very much specially the bagel option. You can toast one side or both side. Good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Hard to know if it’s durable at this point but it’s a good simple toaster that does what I jeed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Swan

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and exactly as pictured. Never been so excited to make toast
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lou Clark

customer_reviews.title: Fast Toaster
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast toaster that even toasts the outside of bread without drying it out. I have 3 and all are working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep the setting but toasts evenly
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking toaster that toasts very evenly. It has a major design flaw, though. It always defaults to toast level 4, and there is no way to change the default. I normally use a setting of 2. I have to remember to change the setting EVERY time I make toast.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron in GR

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: It has been two years since I’ve had this toaster and it still is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: danais santos

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly compact
customer_reviews.text: Good for quick breakfasts for my fiancé and I. Small enough to fit in our cabinet too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Just be sure to be aware that there ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Just be sure to be aware that there is an odor which needs to burn off. Takes maybe 5 full toastings.
customer_reviews.author: Maui wowie

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Produces nicely toasted items with a range of options. Love the digital controls and love the snazzy design. This replaces an Oster that stopped toasting on one side and I'm glad; the old toaster looked so pedestrian. This one has real style to complement its excellent mechanics.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Smaller toaster
customer_reviews.text: The toaster works great; gets 5 stars for all but one thing. The slots are on the small size making slices from wider loaves of break are a tight fit. (Wish I knew this before I purchased.) If you only use standard size bread, this toaster is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Rozzano

customer_reviews.title: Makes toast.
customer_reviews.text: Makes toast evenly. Looks good on the counter. Easier than a toaster over. Good price. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Andy T.

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Toaster
customer_reviews.text: For once we have a toaster that works. Hopefully, this will continue. We appreciate getting the toaster so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Patsy Butch

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. It's a perfect size and pretty too! The buttons are clear and easy to understand. The little shade diagrams of how 'cooked' you want your toast is fairly accurate, but you got to play around with it a little.
customer_reviews.author: AstroMelissa

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Modern Chrome 2 Slice Extra Wide Slot Toaster with Bagel and Defrost Settings, Shade Selector, Toast Boost, Slide-Out Crumb Tray, Auto-Shutoff and Cancel Button (22791)
product_meta.description: Style Name:2 SliceThe Hamilton Beach cool-touch 2 slice toaster has wide 1. 5" Slots, Multi toasting functions and a cool touch exterior. Other functions include automatic toast boost and a convenient crumb tray.
feature_bullets: Bagel setting toasts the cut side, warms the round side
2 slice toaster has large slots to easily fit bagels and Thick slices of artisanal bread, in addition to smaller favorites like English muffins and frozen waffles.
